title: COMMANDCLASSSECURITY2 command class
extract: Description. Use the mmcrnodeclass command to create user-defined node classes. After a node class is created, it can be specified as an argument on commands that accept the -N NodeClass option.
extract_html: Description. Use the mmcrnodeclass command to create user-defined node classes. After a node class is created, it can be specified as an argument on commands that accept the -N NodeClass option.
